website_summaries.verdict: A beautiful bracelet that is fun to wear with dressy and formal fashions. However, its durability for everyday wear is questionable.
pros: Gold-tone beads combined with five crystal-embellished beads create an elegant look
Slider clasp has the MK logo and adjusts to about eight inches
Pairs nicely with dresses and other feminine outfits
cons: It's on the delicate side, so wearing it while doing activities that could damage it isn't recommended

customer_reviews.title: ... it to my daughter as a Christmas present she loved it but when she tried to put it on ...
customer_reviews.text: I give it to my daughter as a Christmas present she loved it but when she tried to put it on it breaks instantly!!! I was very disappointed and embarrassed and the the look at my daughters faces was priceless! Very sad!!!! 👎🏽
customer_reviews.author: Maribel

customer_reviews.title: I still love the bracelet
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I am leaving a 4 Star review is because is does not look "rose gold" to me. It just looks gold. I still love the bracelet. It fits fine. The quality is great. And I am a Michael Kors fan of all his products. The picture shows a pinkish color but the bracelet that was shipped to me was gold. Others say they see a rose tint but I do not. Regardless, it is a beautiful bracelet and I will keep it. I am glad I ordered it and will order more products like this soon.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but made for smaller hands/wrists
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bracelet! Rose gold tone is beautiful, lots of dainty sparkle. It's perfect for my wedding ceremony. Definitely not made for a larger hand/wrist. It fits nicely, but had my hand been any larger, it would not have slidden onto my wrist.
customer_reviews.author: Meaghan Dragulski

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loved the style, after a month of wearing a diamond fell out. 😥
customer_reviews.author: Kelly A.

customer_reviews.title: I loved this bracelet but over time the slider toggle lost ...
customer_reviews.text: I loved this bracelet but over time the slider toggle lost it's grip to keep the bracelet tight on my wrist which resulted in it falling off my wrist without me knowing it . I probably will not purchase a bracelet with that type of bracket on it.
customer_reviews.author: Karen M

customer_reviews.title: i love it but i'm so sad about the drop in ...
customer_reviews.text: i love it but i'm so sad about the drop in price i bought it 60$ in 8-8-2018 and now 38.82$ why? i want the difference of money

customer_reviews.title: Nice but defective
customer_reviews.text: As describe and the size is better than I expected for the stones. Only issue is the is the bolo clasp it slides open and needs to be adjusted often

customer_reviews.title: Fits well

customer_reviews.title: Breaks
customer_reviews.text: Don't' buy this bracelet, I have had 2 of them the first broke on the chain after a month and the second broke between the settings after 3 1/2 months. I only wear for dress and was very careful worth the bracelet. It is beautiful but not of the best quality.
customer_reviews.author: Shop til I drop shopper.

customer_reviews.title: Eh..
customer_reviews.text: Really loved the color and the physical look of it although the chain adjustment is rough and feels like its going to break when you adjust it. Also its super small. Even when adjusted to the biggest possible size. Love the

customer_reviews.title: Missing Stone :(
customer_reviews.text: Really pretty bracelet but the stone at the end was missing and now I have to pay to have it replaced. I cannot order a new one because they are all gone.

customer_reviews.title: Absolute great gift

The quality is good. It is not cheap looking nor feels like cheap jewelry. I believe this is authentic Michael Kors. It had a bit of weight on it. It comes with a Michael Kors pouch and the jewelry itself is properly protected for shipping.
